numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that there is more diversity among players who are people of color.
2. I notice that there is less diversity among coaches.
3. In baseball, the percentage of players who are people of color decreased.
4. This percentage dropped from between 60% and 83% to 40%.
5. I wonder whether the lack of coaches of color relates to not wanting people of color in leadership positions.
6. I also wonder whether the lack of coaches of color relates to more people of color wanting to be players.
7. I wonder why there are fewer people of color in baseball.
8. If there is more diversity in sports, then this can show young children of color that they can do that too.
9. Positions of leadership are important in sports.
10. Seeing people who look like you can be empowering.
11. Seeing people who look like you can show you that you can accomplish your dreams.
12. This graph shows the number of people of color in sports.
13. The headline is: Diversity in Sports - Is It Enough?
